versions.title: Bug fixes, live playtime, UI polish
changes: Removed non-functional Minecraft Versions chart from Analytics page
Removed unused ProtocolVersionMapper dead code from plugin
Live playtime tracking: player playtime now updates every 30 seconds while online, instead of only on disconnect
Properties tab now auto-refreshes data when selected (no full page reload needed)
RAM setting changes now show clear feedback that a server restart is needed to apply
Spigot platform badge had broken styling in dark mode
Platform badge colors updated to match brand identities (Paper→blue, Velocity→teal, Purpur→purple, Sponge→lime)
